Author: Rumi
Content: Somewhere beyond right and wrong there is a garden. I'll meet you there.

Author: Bruce Lee
Content: To hell with circumstances; I create opportunities.

Author: Ralph Marston
Content: Don't waste time on excuses, just get it done

Author: Lao Tzu
Content: A good traveler has no fixed plans and is not intent on arriving

Author: Earl Nightingale
Content: Never give up on a dream just because it will take time to accomplish it. Time will pass anyway
